javadoc:
The MutableMemBuffer interface facilitates
 repositioning of a MemBuffer object.

methods.name: advance

params.name: displacement
params.comment: the amount to adjust the pointer by.

throws.comment: if displacement would cause the buffer position to wrap.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the Address to which offset of 0 points to.
@param addr the new base Address.
methods.name: setPosition
methods.comment: Sets the Address to which offset of 0 points to.

methods.javadoc:
Create a cloned copy of this MutableMemBuffer
@return new cloned instance of this buffer object
methods.name: clone
methods.comment: Create a cloned copy of this MutableMemBuffer

return.comment: new cloned instance of this buffer object

name: MutableMemBuffer
comment:
